author: Scott Lewis
comment: Can't get it to work on Moto 360, 5.01. "Unfortunately RS launcher has stopped."
title: Crashes

author: Brian Clem
comment: I love this.  Makes things much better because access it gained ... settings stuff is easier.
title: working very well with samsung gear live

author: Brandon Gaona
comment: Samsung gear live. Really like the idea of a button that is on the screen at all times for the launcher, but when I opened the launcher some of the apps are cut off at the bottom, and also there is a app sized gap between the first line of apps and the rest of the apps.
title: Its ok, needs work
